wikipedia_page.main: Connor Farrer (born 6 June 1995) is a Welsh professional rugby league footballer who plays as a hooker for the West Wales Raiders in Betfred League 1 and Wales at international level.

response: *On 2 October, Matty Fozard pulled out of the squad due to a broken jaw. He was replaced by Connor Farrer.
